content: Our guidance calls for: Net sales of $393 million to $401 million reflecting approximately 5.5% to 7.5% organic growth, once again led by continued volume growth; adjusted EBITDA of $132 million to $137 million; adjusted EPS of $0.62 to $0.64 per share, which assumes a 26% effective tax rate and $115 million to $116 million diluted shares outstanding; and capital expenditures of $30 million to $35 million, which is approximately 7.5% to 9% of net sales.
